sellerCard.description:
B.Tech. 2nd year drop-out, blogger since my 10th Class, and Wordpress Developer since 2016.

I have been blogging since 2010 and have managed multiple personal websites and blogs, also managed multiple business websites from Development to Promoting Sales.

Self learnt Android development and developed apps since 2018. 

Have also managed and developed eCommerce Stores Wordpress and Custom Websites. 

I love coding for simplicity, efficiency and accuracy.

Let's work together so that I can prove my words?

description.content:
Are you looking for a Custom WordPress Website for your Business or Brand? Stuck where to start?


You are at the right place! With my services, you can get your business website live in no time!


What you will get? 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED


  1. 24/7 Availability, Easy Quick Communication, Live Support for Clients
  2. Top-notch integrations & functionalities
  3. e-Commerce Ready
  4. User-friendly & SEO Optimized
  5. Fast and Responsive Website (Super fast load speeds)
  6. Live Chat Integrations
  7. Email Opt-in Integrations, including MailChimp, Convertbox, etc.
  8. Social Media Integrations & Automations
  9. 100% Secured & Safe
  10. Integrations with Page Builders - Elementor, WP Bakery, etc.
  11. Customizations with top themes such as Astra, Divi, Kadence, GeneratePress, Avada, etc.
  12. Content Upload as per request.
  13. Free Post-sale service!
  14. UNLIMITED REVISIONS


Have you thought of any existing Theme or Templates you would want to use? Or any idea or mockups for the UI/UX or how you want it to look like? Not yet? I'll help you decide, let's connect!


For samples, you can inbox me!


Let's discuss your requirements and start with the project! We also build custom websites from scratch. We are open to custom orders. Let's talk!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you add custom functionalities to the Website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can add custom functionalities of any theme or plugin or if needed, I can also develop custom plugin for the needs. I've vast expertise with Custom WordPress Plugins Development.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do I need to have theme or template with me before ordering your service?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Not at all. If you want me to use any specific theme on your website then just let me know. We can discuss and choose a best suitable theme or template while I work on your order.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you develop SEO Optimized Website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I follow all the modern techniques while developing and designing any website, whether on WordPress, Wix or Custom. I make sure the website stays top-notch, fully optimized, SEO friendly, fast and responsive. I bet you won't regret working with me! ðŸ˜‰

packageList.title: Mini
packageList.description: Single Page Professional Wordpress website for your business or blog.

packageList.title: Large
packageList.description: Custom WordPress Website with upto 5 Informational Pages, Slider, Social Media, etc.

packageList.title: Business
packageList.description: Custom Wordpress website for more than 5 pages, custom functionalities, integrations and much more.

milestones.title: Planning
milestones.description: I'll use your provided requirements to start planning your website.

steps.title: Requirements
steps.description: We'll make sure I have everything needed to complete your project.

steps.title: Specifications
steps.description: I'll write the specifications for your site's functionality and features.

milestones.title: Development
milestones.description: I'll develop the website and deliver a working product for your review.

steps.title: Website Design
steps.description: I'll create the design for your website.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: I'll develop the website and deliver a working product for your review.

milestones.title: Content & Delivery
milestones.description: I'll complete the website for delivery.

steps.title: Content Upload
steps.description: I'll upload your content (copy, images, videos, etc.) to your website.

steps.title: Delivery
steps.description: I'll send you the final delivery for review and feedback.

reviews.comment:
Husen has done a great job. He built a website for us in Worpress (5 main pages + ~10 sub pages) and created custom plugins. Based on a design created in FIgma, he was able to realize the website 1:1. The plugin also works perfectly. Even when the design of the website had to be adapted at short notice, he was able to implement this very quickly.

Pro:
- Proactive and fast communication. 
- Very professional
- Good price/performance ratio
- Ongoing support for questions and problems

Contra:
- Nothing worth mentioning

I can highly recommend Husen / ConicPlex.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much, Christopher! It was a pleasure bringing your vision to life. I appreciate your kind words and look forward to continuing collaboration with you!

reviews.comment:
I had the pleasure of working with Husen, who developed our website from scratch.From the very start, his positive attitude and consistent smile made the entire process smooth and enjoyable. The best part about working with him is his incredible ability to quickly pinpoint the root cause of any issue. He doesn't just patch things up; he dives deep to resolve problems at their core, ensuring that everything runs seamlessly.

Husen's professionalism, problem-solving skills, and work ethic are second to none. I have no doubt that if he continues to keep his head on his shoulders and that smile on his face, he will go a long way. His dedication to quality and attention to detail make him a true asset to any project.

Thank you, Husen, for everything you've done for both Evolve Snacks and Khelmanch. Looking forward to more collaborations with you in the future!"

â€” Angad Sehgal, Founder of Evolve Snacks and Khelmanch

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much, Angad, for your kind words! It was a pleasure developing Khelmanchâ€™s website and app and being part of your vision. Your support made everything smooth. Looking forward to more exciting projects together!
Thank you too! Let's keep going!

reviews.comment: Husen is very good developer and ready to help at any point of time highly recommend him

seller_response.comment: Glad to know. I would love to have more collab with you in future. Thank you!

This was my first gig with this seller, after our start-up meeting we considering to work with each other and it works very well. thanks for the changes to my plugin everything is working very well in a short amound of time! Thanks al lot i will order again by this seller.
